channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America's Frozen Housing Market Is Warping the Economy
item.description: Cheap mortgages are forcing millions of U.S. homeowners to stay put. That is becoming a problem well beyond the property market.

item.title: Trump Media’s stock up 8% as markets react to Biden’s uneven debate performance
item.description: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.’s stock rose 8% early Friday, after widespread criticism of the performance of incumbent President Joe Biden in h...

item.title: How to Get More Dollars into Tax-Sheltered Roth Accounts
item.description: Many savers can use other ways to boost Roth IRA and 401(k) balances ahead of a 2025 deadline

item.title: After Biden’s debate showing, markets confront chance of a new candidate
item.description: Polling expert Nate Silver says California Gov. Gavin Newsom or Vice President Kamala Harris would be better choices.

item.title: AI Frenzy Propels Stocks to Monster First Half
item.description: The S&P 500 has climbed 15% despite reduced hopes for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.

item.title: ‘Our children have varying degrees of success’: My husband and I are in our 80s and have $300,000 to leave our 3 children. Do we give more to our underemployed son?
item.description: “At 56, he has few prospects for his future.”

item.title: Japan Will Take Appropriate Action Against Excessive Yen Moves, Finance Minister Says
item.description: Japanese Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki said the government would take appropriate action against excessive yen moves, although he declined to comme...

item.title: How can we tap the equity in our home without paying a 7% interest rate? We currently have a mortgage rate of less than 4%.
item.description: “Should I accept that 7%-plus interest rate is the starting rate these days?”

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq Extend Run of Gains
item.description: Walgreens sinks after pharmacy chain reports weak quarterly results, but Thursday continued a stretch of calm for the stock market overall.

item.title: ‘I can’t get them to process the claim’: My husband, 82, died and his long-term-care insurance is stiffing us for $11,000. What can we do?
item.description: How do you keep up the tenacity to fight through red tape when you’re grieving?
